auth.tagline: Built by lifters for lifters, sign in to continue tracking your progress.
auth.joinTagline: Join LiftGraph to plan workouts, track PRs, and stay motivated.
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.resetPasswordInstructions: Enter your email to receive password reset instructions.
auth.wellHelpYouGetBackIn: We'll help you get back in
auth.passwordResetEmailSent: Password reset email sent. Please check your inbox.

workout.title: Workout
workout.noExercisesYet: No exercises yet. Tap "Add Exercise" to add one to this workout.
workout.eachExerciseMustHaveSet: Each exercise must have at least one set.
workout.workoutDateInvalid: Workout date is invalid. Use ISO 8601 format.
workout.addAtLeastOneExercise: Add at least one exercise to the workout.
workout.workoutValidatedCannotModify: This workout has been validated and cannot be modified.
workout.workoutAlreadyExistsOnDate: A workout already exists on this date. Please choose a different date.
workout.exerciseMustHaveSet: Exercise "{{name}}" must have at least one set.
workout.setRequiresNumericValues: Set {{setIndex}} in "{{exerciseName}}" requires numeric weight, reps, and RIR.

program.title: Program
program.simpleProgramMustHaveWeek: Simple program must have at least one week.
program.alternatingProgramMustHaveWeeks: Alternating program must have exactly two weeks.
program.advancedProgramMustHavePhase: Advanced program must have at least one phase.
program.allPhasesMustHaveName: All phases must have a name.
program.pleaseSignInToCreate: Please sign in to create programs.
program.programSavedSuccessfully: Your program has been saved successfully.
program.programNotFound: We could not find that program.
program.programDeletedSuccessfully: The program has been deleted successfully.
program.deleteProgramMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
program.pleaseSignInToView: Please sign in to view programs.

settings.title: Settings
settings.selectPreferredUnits: Select your preferred measurement units. All weights are stored in kilograms and converted for display.
settings.failedToSavePreferences: Failed to save preferences. Please try again.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.hereToHelp: We're here to help you achieve your goals
contactUs.subject: Subject
contactUs.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...

rateUs.title: Rate Us
rateUs.feedbackHelpsUs: Your feedback helps us improve and motivates us to keep building great features for you!
rateUs.howWouldYouRate: How would you rate your experience?
rateUs.shareYourThoughts: Share your thoughts, suggestions, or what you love about PowerLift Pro...
rateUs.loveTheApp: Love the app? Rate us on your app store!

exercise.addCustomExercise: Add a custom exercise to your library
exercise.descriptionPlaceholder: Add a description or notes about this exercise
exercise.pleaseSignInToCreate: Please sign in to create exercises.

customRange.endDateAfterStart: End date must be after the start date. Please select a later date.
customRange.selectBothDates: Please select both start and end dates.
customRange.endDateAfterStartValid: End date must be after the start date. Please select a valid date range.
